net.sf.hajdbc.distributed.jgroups

Class JGroupsCommandDispatcher<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.hajdbc.distributed.jgroups.JGroupsCommandDispatcher<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the execution context type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandDispatcher<C>, Lifecycle, org.jgroups.blocks.RequestHandler, org.jgroups.MembershipListener, org.jgroups.MessageListener

    public class JGroupsCommandDispatcher<C>
extends Object
implements org.jgroups.blocks.RequestHandler, CommandDispatcher<C>, org.jgroups.MembershipListener, org.jgroups.MessageListener
    A JGroups-based command dispatcher.
    Author:
    Paul Ferraro
    See Also:
    MessageDispatcher

      • JGroupsCommandDispatcher

        public JGroupsCommandDispatcher(String id,
                        org.jgroups.Channel channel,
                        long timeout,
                        C context,
                        Stateful stateful,
                        MembershipListener membershipListener)
                         throws Exception
        Constructs a new ChannelCommandDispatcher.
        Parameters:
        id - the channel name
        channel - a JGroups channel
        timeout - the command timeout
        context - the execution context
        stateful - the state transfer handler
        membershipListener - notified of membership changes
        Throws:
        Exception - if channel cannot be created
